DOC.brief_summary: Running successful journal club is of the important goals for postgraduate education.In this study, the effect of a 6-month interactive educational course on journal clubs of Mashhad Dental school was observed using a valid and reliable checklist(r=0.74). Data will be evaluated and compared using spss software by t-test.
DOC.criteria: Faculty members of Dental School,Postgraduate departments Faculty members of other schools,Undergraduate departments
